job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pThe National Security Agency in Texas is hiring for the following positions and many more at httpsapplyintelligencecareersgovjoblistingsagencyNSA ppbrppSoftware Engineer  httpsapplyintelligencecareersgovjobdescription1168299ppbrppSoftware Engineer  httpsapplyintelligencecareersgovjobdescription1166240ppbrppSoftware Engineer  httpsapplyintelligencecareersgovjobdescription1164116ppbrppNetwork Manager  httpsapplyintelligencecareersgovjobdescription1166238ppbrppCyber Network Professional OffensiveDefensive  httpsapplyintelligencecareersgovjobdescription1166578ppbrppContact me if you determine NSA in Texas may be a great fit for your professional career especially if you already possess a CIFS  P If youve already applied for a position with us please let me know so I can connect some of the dots for you from a recruiter and hiring manager perspective Cheers Gregp
